citation.abstract: In our study, we describe the use of spider silk fibres as a new material in nerve tissue engineering, in a 20-mm sciatic nerve defect in rats.
citation.title: Spider silk fibres in artificial nerve constructs promote peripheral nerve regeneration.

blogs.title: Artificial nerve grafts made from spider silk
blogs.summary: EVERY year, hundreds of thousands of people suffer from paralyzed limbs as a result of peripheral nerve injury. Recently, implantation of artificial nerve grafts has become the method of choice for repairing damaged peripheral nerves. Grafts can lead to so

author.name: Neurophilosophy
